response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' needs and understanding the true worth of our offerings. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product provides, we are offering it to you at a special price of $800,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, aiming to make it more accessible to you while still ensuring a fair return on our investment. We trust that this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let us know, and we will arrange for the necessary documentation and delivery.", "product_price": 800000}
